string-array.name: crashCatchDialog
string-array.item: Open BART is misbehaving, and our developers have been notified. If you please, write us and tell us how you got here!

resources.string:
Open BART is free and open-source software. All train estimates are displayed as minutes until departure.

Happy Riding

string-array.name: aboutDialog
string-array.item:
Open BART is open source software (GPLv3), so it belongs to all of us. Check out the code on github.

Write us!
openbart@dbro.pro.

Thanks

thebuzzmedia
for a slick xml parser!

Rich Jones of Gun.io
for a smooth icon, and for breaking this app many times so you won\'t have to.

resources.string: I\'ll vibrate when you need to move

Experimental Feature!
I can vibrate your phone when your stops are approaching! You can also check the notification bar at any time to see your next move.
